t: The Top 10 Amazon Brands of 2024 by Market Share | BeautyMatter
s: March 4, 2025 - In 2024, the brand was the #3 skincare brand, with its Snail Mucin 96 Power Serum achieving incredible milestones: it was the ninth top sponsored item of the year, the #1 selling beauty item during 2024 Prime Day, and it currently holds the #1 spot among facial serums. The Snail Mucin serum essentially kicked off the K-beauty domination of 2024 and has maintained its leadership, paving the way for other rising stars like Laneige and Tirtir to reach similar success on Amazon...

t: Amazon tops YouGov’s best value brand rankings for 2024: YouGov report | Marketing Dive

t: Amazon cements its status as the world’s most valuable brand
